snippet: Rob Klinkhammer and Mikke Boedker each had two goals for Phoenix, whose worst loss of the season came against the Islanders two months ago.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Phoenix Coyotes defeat New York Islanders, 6-3; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Rob Klinkhammer and Mikke Boedker each had two goals for Phoenix, whose worst loss of the season came against the Islanders two months ago.

headline.main: Coyotes Avenge Earlier Thrashing by Islanders
headline.print_headline: Coyotes Avenge Earlier Thrashing by Islanders
